query:
-- Update Free plan (keep same)
UPDATE plans 
SET maxCredentials = 10, maxFolders = 2 
WHERE name = 'Free';

-- Update Basic plan
UPDATE plans 
SET price = 15.00, maxCredentials = 100, maxFolders = 20 
WHERE name = 'Basic';

-- Update Corporate plan
UPDATE plans 
SET price = 25.00, maxCredentials = 500, maxFolders = 200 
WHERE name = 'Corporate';

-- Verify changes
SELECT id, name, price, maxCredentials, maxFolders FROM plans ORDER BY price;
